name: Goal tracking template for Figma!
description:
I created this template to understand better if and how I was contributing to my goals and now I’m sharing it with you! 


This template uses a Kanban-style approach to keep track of activities within a goal. This tracking style allows you and others to see your goals and your contributions toward them.


I created this template to understand better if and how I was contributing to my goals and now I’m sharing it with you! 


There are many methods and tools for setting and tracking goals; this is merely one. Use it if it works for you.
